DOC.detailed_description: Tilt table test patient complex regional pain syndrome : Effects heart rate variability baroreceptor sensitivity . Primary outcome parameter : Autonomic cardiac function
DOC.criteria: Age : 18 old . Pain > 3 month . Diagnosed CPRS acc . diagnostic research criterion ( Harder et al. , 2005 ) . Inclusion healthy subject : age , gender , BMImatched . Other significant disease affect parameter measure , include cardiovascular disease . Treatment anticholinergic , sympathomimetics parasympathomimetics , alpha betaadrenergics .
